content: **knitted jacket in drops daisy or drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with round yoke relief pattern honeycomb pattern and double neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern da-036 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-750-800-900 g colour 02 marzipan or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 600-650-700-750-850-900 g colour 50 light beige **buttons** drops buttons no 511 6-6-6-7-7-7 items **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
